original_text: And all the people that came together to that sight, beholding the things which were done, smote their breasts, and returned.
korean_text: 이를 구경하러 모인 무리도 그 된 일을 보고 다 가슴을 치며 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: And all the people that came together
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 함께 모여 온 모든 사람들은

sentences.original_text: beholding the things which were done
